name: Castle Quest
description:
Castle Quest is my first completed game a small puzzle game about building your own small town and eventually a castle. Stack three or more similar game-items to create a new and better one. The more items you combine at once, the more points you get. In addition you can store a single item in the top left corner for later use. But watch out for rain and the floodings that will occur afterwards!

Features:

  • Fun, addictive and endless match-three puzzle.
  • Easy to learn, but hard to master.
  • No in-app purchases. Play for free whenever you want and as much as you want!

Have fun!

Game by:

Adrian Kuper
